Crotale got up form his sitting position. "Be with you in a flash 
Pacifix."  He ran down the corridor, maneuvering his large body 
easily through them, knowing everyturn and obstacle before he 
reached them.  As he rushed out the door he transformed into his 
tank mode, more sensors then guns on his body.
